import React, { useState } from "react"; import CardTable from "components/Cards/CardTable.js"; export default function Tickets() { const [showForm, setShowForm] = useState(false); const [editingTicket, setEditingTicket] = useState(null); const [ticketData, setTicketData] = useState({ ticketNumber: "", passengerName: "", scheduleId: "", seatNumber: "", price: "", status: "confirmed", paymentStatus: "paid" }); const [ticketsList, setTicketsList] = useState([ { id: 1, ticketNumber: "TKT001", passengerName: "John Doe", scheduleId: "Express 1 - 08:00", seatNumber: "A1", price: "2500", status: "confirmed", paymentStatus: "paid" }, { id: 2, ticketNumber: "TKT002", passengerName: "Jane Smith", scheduleId: "Express 2 - 09:00", seatNumber: "B3", price: "2000", status: "confirmed", paymentStatus: "paid" } ]); const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setTicketData({ ...ticketData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (editingTicket) { // Update existing ticket setTicketsList(ticketsList.map(item => item.id === editingTicket.id ? { ...ticketData, id: editingTicket.id } : item )); setEditingTicket(null); } else { // Add new ticket const newTicket = { ...ticketData, id: Date.now() }; setTicketsList([...ticketsList, newTicket]); } // Reset form setTicketData({ ticketNumber: "", passengerName: "", scheduleId: "", seatNumber: "", price: "", status: "confirmed", paymentStatus: "paid" }); setShowForm(false); }; const handleEdit = (ticket) => { setEditingTicket(ticket); setTicketData(ticket); setShowForm(true); }; const handleDelete = (id) => { setTicketsList(ticketsList.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const handleCancel = () => { setShowForm(false); setEditingTicket(null); setTicketData({ ticketNumber: "", passengerName: "", scheduleId: "", seatNumber: "", price: "", status: "confirmed", paymentStatus: "paid" }); }; return ( <>

Ticket Management

{showForm && (

{editingTicket ? "Edit Ticket" : "Issue New Ticket"}

)}
{ticketsList.map((ticket) => ( ))}
Ticket Passenger Schedule Seat Price Status Payment Actions
{ticket.ticketNumber}
{ticket.passengerName} {ticket.scheduleId} {ticket.seatNumber} {ticket.price} RWF {ticket.status} {ticket.paymentStatus}
); }
